casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jeffrey Neal DUKE. No. 57A04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 6, 2005. William N. Farrell, Senior Deputy Attorney General, G. Patrick Murphy, Special Deputy Attorney General, Michael K. Lands, District Attorney, Mikko Red Arrow, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th day of May 2005 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

*290"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Duke) shall have up to and including the 6th day of May 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of May 2005."
